name: Oto
headline: Digital therapy for tinnitus
description:
Oto’s digital programs are the best way to manage tinnitus, and at a fraction of the cost of in person treatment. 

Tinnitus or ringing in the ears affects 1 in 8 people, and before Oto effective therapy was only available via expensive meetings with a specialist.

founders.name: Edmund Farrar, Founder
founders.description: Dr Edmund Farrar is the co-founder of Oto, a digital health startup that allows anyone to instantly access science-based treatment for tinnitus and other underserved chronic conditions. Before Oto, Ed spent 6 years as an RAF doctor. During this time, he developed tinnitus himself, and decided to found Oto.

founders.name: George Leidig, Founder
founders.description: Product/tech founder at Oto. Ex military doctor.

# Tune out tinnitus, tune back into life
Find peace with Oto's clinically proven digital program. Built by experts living with tinnitus.
[Find out how](https://www.joinoto.com/<#why-oto>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6445697860d48b2c3f16427e_Frame%208.svg)[![down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/644569f1e38bb7fa2609f13e_Arrow%201.svg)](https://www.joinoto.com/<#>)
## Tired of hearing “you just need to learn to live with it?”
Your doctor says nothing can be done. Everywhere you read online, it's horror stories and conflicting advice.You're stuck, **but you don't have to be**.
In partnership with

Introducing Oto
## Learn how to stop hearing your tinnitus.
![number 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6446bc4d30d26a4aefc3a06a_Group%201858.svg)
### A digital program that works.
Rely on proven science, not myths. Our approach is based on cognitive behavioural therapy - a proven treatment for tinnitus.‍<https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31743297/>
[Learn more](https://www.joinoto.com/</program>)
![2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6548d9793dfa3cf5a887ab1b_Group%201860%20\(1\).svg)
### Built from decades of experience.
Our team of doctors, audiologists, ENTs, and tinnitus researchers brings unparalleled expertise to your journey toward relief.
[Learn more](https://www.joinoto.com/</program>)
![number 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6446bd6c41399fc9452b7139_Group%201860.svg)
### A 96% success rate.
When we say we can help, we mean it. Our program consistently delivers proven results—results so reliable, we guarantee them.
[Learn more](https://www.joinoto.com/</program>)
How does Oto work?
## Tinnitus relief in just 10 minutes a day.
![CBT Program](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/65846e68682399e6d2dce66f_Group%20163%20\(2\).png)
### Your personalised audio program.
Includes everything you need to tune out tinnitus in 90 days.
• An assessment to find out where you need help
• Recorded audio sessions that mimic face to face treatment
• Unlimited support from our expert team 
[Learn more](https://www.joinoto.com/</program>)
![Oto program](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/65846d7054201a5c7a40d8e2_program%20\(4\).webp)
## Powered by the Oto app.
### Access your programs
Tuning out tinnitus takes a little practice. Embed what you’re learning any time, anywhere.
[Download now](https://www.joinoto.com/<https:/otohealth.page.link/1YMJ>)
![Oto events](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/65846d85b64272187281c552_events%20\(2\).png)

## Powered by the Oto app
### Sleep and Focus Courses
Master sleep, focus, and relaxation with tinnitus-specific courses.
[Download now](https://www.joinoto.com/<https:/otohealth.page.link/1YMJ>)
![Peaceful woman](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/64495f723d613f1a60b8977e_shutterstock_1444222019%201.webp)
The most helpful tool...
"Oto turned my perception of tinnitus around when nothing else seemed to help. I can say it is the most helpful tool available to any new or current tinnitus sufferer."
Imran - Oto user.
I gained control...
"I found Oto at a time when my tinnitus had spiked and spiralled out of control. It offers a personalised step by step approach to therapy. Oto’s therapy helped me to gain some control, calm and relief..."
Jan - Oto user.
Suddenly I found success...
"I found Oto… wow what a blessing, I was going off my mind and then suddenly I found success. I love keeping up the sessions and I practice the techniques over and over again."
Hassan - Oto user.
I no longer need support...
"Thank you Oto team for this amazing therapy. The CBT sessions made all the difference to my recovery. I actually no longer need the support of Oto but I credit it with giving me tools that I can rely on to manage my tinnitus."
Claire - Oto user.

![arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6446c25f41399f541a2bacff_Vector%2022.svg)

## Built by experts living with tinnitus.
![Anna pugh](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/64495dd07a5de458dd02b7ce_22-11_oto_stills-08457%201%20\(2\).webp)
Anna Pugh
Award-winning audiologist and tinnitus therapist
![tab open](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6447a1080a5d281ee3b9b59c_Group%201861.svg)
![tab open](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6447a1080a5d281ee3b9b59c_Group%201861.svg)
Anna Pugh
With over 30 years’ experience in the field, award-winning hearing therapist and audiologist Anna Pugh was a perfect fit for the founding Oto team. Anna’s incredible knowledge across audiology issues, combined with her personal experience with tinnitus, aligned closely with Oto’s goal to build a unique coaching program that delivers ongoing, personalised, holistic support.
![Jameel M](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/64495cc6e1b89bd0a305ca4b_22-11_oto_stills-08422%201%20\(2\).webp)
Jameel Muzaffar
ENT Consultant and leading hearing researcher
![tab open](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6447a1080a5d281ee3b9b59c_Group%201861.svg)
![tab open](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6447a1080a5d281ee3b9b59c_Group%201861.svg)
**Jameel Muzaffar**
A world-leading ENT consultant and hearing researcher, Jameel Muzaffar is at the forefront of ground-breaking audiology therapies. His expertise in the latest, scientifically backed tinnitus therapies have helped frame the Oto program around what really works, pushing the boundaries to get the best in tinnitus care.
![Dr George Leidig](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/64495d1c119c83acb0b11486_Screenshot%202023-04-26%20at%2015.11%202.webp)
Dr George Leidig
Oto Founder‍
![tab open](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6447a1080a5d281ee3b9b59c_Group%201861.svg)
![tab open](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6447a1080a5d281ee3b9b59c_Group%201861.svg)
Dr. George Leidig
George Leidig, a doctor with eight years’ experience in the Royal Navy, co-founded Oto with Dr Edmund Farrar following his own struggles with tinnitus. Having seen first-hand the impact the condition can have on people's lives, George and Ed set out to create an effective and accessible tinnitus coaching program for all who need support.
![Dr Edmund Farrar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/64495d4117f9b2a245add36e_Screenshot%202023-04-26%20at%2015.11%202%20\(1\).webp)
Dr Edmund Farrar
Oto Founder‍
![tab open](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6447a1080a5d281ee3b9b59c_Group%201861.svg)
![tab open](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6447a1080a5d281ee3b9b59c_Group%201861.svg)
Dr. Edmund Farrar
Ex-military doctor Edmund Farrar co-founded Oto after realising the challenges his patients faced when trying to access tinnitus support. Shaped by their own experiences with tinnitus, Ed and Dr George Leidig shared a vision to help as many people as possible get their lives back from tinnitus through expert tinnitus coaching.
![arrow left](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6446c25fbfbacebe6f21ede8_Vector%2023.svg)
![arrow right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61bb2cbcd491b4771cf88357/6446c25f41399f541a2bacff_Vector%2022.svg)
[Learn more](https://www.joinoto.com/</about-us>)
Join our next event:

Imran - Oto user.
I gained control...

## Built by experts living with tinnitus.
![Anna pugh⟨26⟩].webp)
Anna Pugh
Award-winning audiologist and tinnitus therapist
![tab open⟨27⟩]
![tab open⟨27⟩]
Anna Pugh
With over 30 years’ experience in the field, award-winning hearing therapist and audiologist Anna Pugh was a perfect fit for the founding Oto team. Anna’s incredible knowledge across audiology issues, combined with her personal experience with tinnitus, aligned closely with Oto’s goal to build a unique coaching program that delivers ongoing, personalised, holistic support.
![Jameel M⟨28⟩].webp)
Jameel Muzaffar
ENT Consultant and leading hearing researcher
![tab open⟨27⟩]
![tab open⟨27⟩]
**Jameel Muzaffar**
A world-leading ENT consultant and hearing researcher, Jameel Muzaffar is at the forefront of ground-breaking audiology therapies. His expertise in the latest, scientifically backed tinnitus therapies have helped frame the Oto program around what really works, pushing the boundaries to get the best in tinnitus care.
![Dr George Leidig⟨29⟩]
Dr George Leidig
Oto Founder‍
![tab open⟨27⟩]
![tab open⟨27⟩]
Dr. George Leidig
George Leidig, a doctor with eight years’ experience in the Royal Navy, co-founded Oto with Dr Edmund Farrar following his own struggles with tinnitus. Having seen first-hand the impact the condition can have on people's lives, George and Ed set out to create an effective and accessible tinnitus coaching program for all who need support.
![Dr Edmund Farrar⟨30⟩].webp)
Dr Edmund Farrar
Oto Founder‍
![tab open⟨27⟩]
![tab open⟨27⟩]
Dr. Edmund Farrar
Ex-military doctor Edmund Farrar co-founded Oto after realising the challenges his patients faced when trying to access tinnitus support. Shaped by their own experiences with tinnitus, Ed and Dr George Leidig shared a vision to help as many people as possible get their lives back from tinnitus through expert tinnitus coaching.

generated_description:
Oto is a London-based health tech startup founded in 2019, with a mission focused on providing digital therapy for tinnitus—a condition that affects about one in eight people and was previously managed only through costly specialist consultations. Oto streamlines this process, offering a clinically validated digital program to manage tinnitus effectively and at a fraction of traditional treatment costs.

Part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, Oto operates with a lean team of five and has ben supported by prestigious partners including Innovate UK, the University of Cambridge, and NHS Mid and South Essex. Their platform taps into cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)—a proven method for alleviating tinnitus symptoms. With a reported success rate of 96%, the program guarantees measurable results.

We've all been there, tuning out of conversations because of that constant ringing or buzzing in our ears. Oto understands this struggle, creating programs that require just 10 minutes of daily commitment. These personalized audio sessions mimic in-person therapy, helping users regain control over their condition with unlimited expert support.

Oto’s offerings don't stop at audio therapy; they’ve developed an app that provides 100+ sounds, sleep courses, focus strategies, and exclusive events with leading tinnitus experts. Real users share heartfelt testimonials, highlighting transformations from overwhelming anxiety to regained peace and control.

If you're battling tinnitus and tired of being told, "Just learn to live with it," Oto might be the lifeline you need. Discover more about their innovative approach and how to start your journey towards relief at [joinoto.com](https://www.joinoto.com).
